references.paper_title: A review of nadir point estimation procedures using evolutionary approaches: A tale of dimensionality reduction
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of existing nadir point estimation methods, highlighting their limitations and informing the development of the BDNE method.

references.paper_title: Proper efficiency and the theory of vector maximization
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the concept of proper Pareto optimality, which is crucial for understanding the theoretical guarantees of the BDNE method.

references.paper_title: MOEA/D: A multiobjective evolutionary algorithm based on decomposition
references.reason: This paper introduces MOEA/D, a highly influential multi-objective evolutionary algorithm used as a component within the BDNE framework for solving the lower-level optimization problems.

references.paper_title: Scalable test problems for evolutionary multiobjective optimization
references.reason: This paper introduces a benchmark suite of test problems widely used in multi-objective optimization research, including the problems used in the experimental validation of the BDNE method.

references.paper_title: On the evolutionary optimization of many conflicting objectives
references.reason: This paper provides valuable insights into the challenges of handling many conflicting objectives in evolutionary optimization and offers relevant context for the BDNE method's contribution.
